text: The following is the complete list of films produced and distributed by an American company The Weinstein Company. The company was founded by Bob and Harvey Weinstein in 2005. The company's first release in 2005 was the crime thriller film Derailed (starring Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel, and Clive Owen). In March 2018, the company declared bankruptcy. In July 2018, the rights to its films were acquired by Lantern Entertainment. == 2000s == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Release date ! Title !
